name: Dear Heli!
wishText: Enjoy your birthday to the fullest, Heli!
textInChatBox: Turning 24 is special, but you’re forever young at heart 😉
text2: So here are the 3 best things about you!
text3: 1) You light up every room with your smile 💖
text4: 2) You have the most amazing sense of humor 😄
outroText: You've worked so hard, now it’s time to celebrate! 🎈
replayText: Don't forget to treat me to pastry sometime! 🍦
